title: Dana Remus
added: '''Dana Remus''' is an American attorney who will serve as [[White House Counsel]] to [[Joe Biden]] when he assumes office on January 20, 2021. Prior to her role in the White House, Remus served as deputy assistant the president and deputy counsel for ethics in the [[Obama administration]], general counsel for the [[Obama Foundation]], general counsel for [[Michelle Obama]] and general counsel for the [[Joe Biden 2020 presidential campaign]].<ref name="Aldridge">{{cite news |last1=Aldridge |first1=Bailey |title=Who is Dana Remus? Senior counsel to President-elect Biden has a North Carolina tie |url=https://www.newsobserver.com/news/nation-world/national/article247236714.html |accessdate=17 November 2020 |work=The News & Observer |date=17 November 2020}}</ref>

In the [[Obama administration]], Remus served as deputy counsel for ethics and a deputy assistant to [[Barack Obama]]. After Obama left office, Remus joined the [[Obama Foundation]] as general counsel and also served as counsel to [[Michelle Obama]]. During the [[Joe Biden 2020 presidential campaign]], she also served as general counsel.
Remus taught judicial and legal ethics at the [[University of North Carolina School of Law]].<ref name="Aldridge"/>

Remus was named [[White House Counsel]] on November 17, 2020.<ref name="Aldridge"/><ref>{{cite news |last1=Barber |first1=C. Ryan |title=Former Alito Clerk Dana Remus Is Named Biden White House Counsel |url=https://www.law.com/nationallawjournal/2020/11/17/former-alito-clerk-dana-remus-is-named-biden-white-house-counsel/?slreturn=20201017132425 |accessdate=17 November 2020 |work=National Law Journal |date=17 November 2020 |language=en}}</ref>

Remus married Brett Holmgren in January 2018 in Washington, D.C. [[Barack Obama]] served as the officiant.<ref name="Gutierrez">{{cite news |last1=Gutierrez |first1=Lisa |title=Wedding guests are flabbergasted by a surprise officiant: Barack Obama |url=https://www.kansascity.com/news/nation-world/article196359229.html |accessdate=17 November 2020 |work=The Kansas City Star |date=24 January 2018}}</ref>
*[https://buildbackbetter.com/the-administration/white-house-senior-staff/dana-remus/ Dana Remus profile] from the Biden-Harris Administration transition
